content.prompt: Based on the data, which of the following policies would most likely make the greatest reduction in the ecological footprint for all of the cities shown in the graph?

choices.label: Setting higher fuel efficiency standards for vehicles
Increasing the cost to use public transportation
Offering tax incentives to individuals who recycle clothing and home goods
Subsidizing the cost of solar panel installation for homeowners

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
